= Introduction =

How to use this object.  I will try and update this when I can but the best thing to do is download the source and read over the header file.


= Important Files =
WebDAV.m
WebDAV.h



= Initialize =
{{{
#import "WebDAV.h"
}}}

{{{
WebDAV *web = [[WebDAV alloc] initWithUsername:@"YOURUSERNAME" password:@"YOURPASSWORD"];
[web setDelegate:self];
}}}

= Listing Directorys =
{{{
[web listDir:@"/"];
}}}
